/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. The sky above is a clear blue, devoid of any clouds, indicating a sunny day. The sun casts its bright rays onto the street, creating a lens flare effect in the image. The overall scene is a harmonious blend of urban architecture and natural elements, a characteristic feature of Beijing's cityscape.
